conversation.event: <0>speech</0> <1>The sisterhood of the Great Temple welcomes you with open arms.</1> <2>matoran</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>speech</0> <1>I am Mother Angela, the advisor of Ga Metru.</1> <2>matoran</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>speech</0> <1>My daughters would gladly carry out the purification process.</1> <2>matoran</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>speech</0> <1>But kneel and say a prayer for our lord, Mata Nui.</1> <2>matoran</2> <3></3> <4></4>
